response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $1,200,000. Considering its unique features and benefits, I believe it could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations, and we can proceed with the transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 1100000}
